title: Macbeth: the witches [study extract]
creator_credit: George Schaefer and Grand Prize Productions
brief_description: Act 1: Scene 1 - the witches foretell Macbeth’s future, on the heath, before Macbeth and MacDuff. Scene 111 - Macbeth is seen in the famous soliloquy scene. Stars Maurice Evans (Macbeth), Ian Bannen (Macduff), and Valerie Taylor, Anita Sharp Bolster and April Olrich (The Witches).
